oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.http.annotations

Packages that use oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.http.annotations
Package
Description
oracle.dbtools.plugin.api.http.annotations
Annotations to describe what URL patterns and HTTP methods a HttpServlet support.
